def box_outliers(series):
    Q1 = series.quantile(0.25)
    Q3 = series.quantile(0.75)
    IQR = Q3 - Q1
    mask = (series < Q1 - 1.5 * IQR) | (series > Q3 + 1.5 * IQR)
    series = series[mask]
    return series
